channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: We‚Äôll miss the sticker goop when it‚Äôs gone. https://t.co/oxoFNRGeyM
@rtanglao @revolver_coffee If I wasn‚Äôt 3357.2 km away, I would!
@blogTO The ‚ÄúI Hate Rubber Boots‚Äù guy.
@blogTO Jos√© Bautista while he‚Äôs doing the bat flip.
@blogTO If you want to see a model of the development, and @DougCoupland‚Äôs art, there‚Äôs a small pop-up art gallery right across the street from it. https://t.co/bZ16WxRptf
Holy cow.

I made Texas beef enchiladas with applewood charred corn sauce for dinner tonight. https://t.co/a3JHgRmNEP
It what was possibly a first, or at least a rarity, I cooked the beef and charred the corn in the morning, so that I didn‚Äôt have to do it all at once at dinnertime. That might be a way to reduce my reluctance to cook, now that I‚Äôm busier in the evenings again.
First Sloane Peterson sighting of the year, near the giant thimble on Spadina Ave. and Richmond St. W. Spring is truly here in Toronto!
@pitchfork @radiohead @thesmiletheband üëÜüèªüëÜüèª @Farewell2harms
May 13th? But I‚Äôm ready for it now! https://t.co/lv4WIOLTJE
@swartable CBC Gem Premium costs money, that‚Äôs the part I forgot. It has a free tier. But ‚Ä¶ https://t.co/aZgobUeoYY $5 a month is ‚Ä¶ a really good price.

On @CanFilmDay, let me remind you that Last Night is the greatest Canadian film of all time, staring Canada‚Äôs greatest actor of all time, future Order of Canada recipient Sandra Oh. #CanFilmDay #JourCin√©Can https://t.co/WJaw94FD7H
@CanFilmDay Last Night is on CBC Gem, if you were wondering whether CBC Gem is worth paying for. @cbcgem @CanFilmDay #CanFilmDay #JourCin√©Can https://t.co/OXbJwfnkML
@CanFilmDay My colleague Steve and I were talking about this, and he‚Äôs American, and he thinks the day should be *International* Canadian Film Day. What do you think? #CanFilmDay

I‚Äôm going to start keeping track of instrumental electronic music that has jokes in it.
Axel Boman‚Äôs Family Vacation album is full of jokes, like the cowbell in one track, and the shifting time signatures in another. He wants to get your body moving, but he also wants to see if you‚Äôre paying attention. https://t.co/4RdB9j5Iot
@skinnylatte I have the same battery tester! Using it, I found a bunch of stray batteries that still have a charge. That alone paid for the tester.
@skinnylatte I don‚Äôt mean to presume, but, uh, can I come over to your place for dinner someday?
@rtanglao üé∂ ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the only cure for glaucoma!‚Äù üé∂

@rtanglao I‚Äôm all for those uncensored things (and some of those censored things), just not weed dispensaries taking over every single beloved local coffee shop. Bring on the (inevitable) Big Marijuana consolidation!

@marksiegal I‚Äôm a creature of habit and momentum. An object at rest, etc. The last two times I moved, it was 1. for a girl and 2. for a job. The ‚Äúonly‚Äù things keeping me in Toronto are my board positions (I have very few friends here), plus it‚Äôs Canada‚Äôs largest, and therefore best, city.
I just got the word today: There will be no Toronto office to go back to. https://t.co/mNgCXjv1y4

@Chris_Livett That would explain what happened to the geese! Wait, no it doesn‚Äôt. They‚Äôve been taken down for a renovation. But I like the ‚Äúplanes can now safely fly indoors‚Äù explanation better. https://t.co/5gSwiN02Wg

When I lived in Vancouver, I took advantage of this. https://t.co/4YLcVStJmH
That said, it was a bit awkward when, as a childless male, there were some games that I wanted to play, which were suitable for people of all ages, that VPL had in the kids section.

I used to be in favour of marijuana decriminalization, but now I‚Äôm inching back towards criminalization because of this. https://t.co/oSsukjFt33
(I live in the neighbourhood @porterthereport is reporting on.)
The reference to ‚Äúcigarette butts in melted snow drifts‚Äù reminded me of @shawnmicallef‚Äôs writing on the subject. https://t.co/IjqQKKeIAr
Say goodbye to your local coffee shops and other beloved small businesses, New Jerseyans. https://t.co/0k7afj1wtL
@TechAmazing https://t.co/fHHVlqt2Eu
How did the judge know that I just dusted off my to plan for a 4-city trip to America? https://t.co/T35lfD4Msq
